title: House of Wonders
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Moroccan, Portuguese
description: Reported all-veg by owner April 2015. Mezze-based menu plus juices and smoothies, pastries, raw vegan desserts, non-dairy milks. This cafe and galeria features rooftop with sea view in the centre of Cascais, up a multiple flights of steep stairs. Free Wi-Fi. Also sells hand-crafted goods and furniture.
